attributes.action: admit that the main problem with the conjestion on the roads and the health service waiting lists is because BRITAIN IS FULL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the main problem with Britains roads and over crowding is that there are too many people on this Island and we should stop all incomers until the population decreases.

rejection.details: there are lots of anti-immigration petitions on the site already
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
